query:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(rc.categoryType, 'no_match') as categoryType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.category) as categories
FROM ingredients i
LEFT JOIN recipeCategories rc ON i.category = rc.name AND rc.restaurantId = 1
WHERE i.restaurantId = 1
GROUP BY rc.categoryType;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute 
SELECT 
  COALESCE(rc.categoryType, 'no_match') as categoryType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.category) as categories
FROM ingredients i
LEFT JOIN recipeCategories rc ON i.category = rc.name AND rc.restaurantId = 1
WHERE i.restaurantId = 1
GROUP BY rc.categoryType;
